body.name: Magic Chef MC77MW Countertop Microwave Oven, Small Microwave for Compact Spaces, 700 Watts, 0.7 Cubic Feet, White
features: 10 POWER LEVELS: This Magic Chef microwave has 10 separate power levels that you can use to cook just about anything; Our compact microwave is innovative for easy cooking and includes a child lock to help keep kids safe and prevent unwanted use

COUNTER SIZE & EXPRESS COOKING FEATURE: This perfectly sized counter microwave features electronic controls, an LED display screen with a must-have kitchen timer, express cooking functions for up to 6 minutes, and a convenient auto-defrost feature

GLASS TURNTABLE & WHITE EXTERIOR: The glass turntable in the microwave rotates as the machine runs, resulting in even cooking every time; The microwave features a white exterior that goes with any decor, a white ceramic interior, and a door-release button

6 PREPROGRAMMED SETTINGS: This microwave allows you to enjoy one-touch cooking; With auto-cook settings for popcorn, dinner plates, baked potatoes, pizza, beverages, and frozen vegetables, this appliance allows for quick meals every time
MAGIC CHEF: For over 90 years, we have been providing affordable and reliable products in the USA; We use our trusted experience to produce and maintain quality products that we stand behind
body.description: The White Magic Chef 0.7-Cu. Ft. Countertop Microwave has a compact design that doesn't obstruct your counter space, yet delivers 700 watts of power and has 10 power levels that give you a wide variety of cooking options. The digital display is easy to read and the handy kitchen timer is a must-have for any cook in the kitchen. There are 6 quick-set buttons on the microwave that quickly cook common food items including popcorn, dinner plate, baked potato, pizza, beverage, and frozen vegetables. Convenient auto defrost modes let you defrost by either weight or time. The express cooking function automatically sets the cook time from 1 minute to 6 minutes at the push of 1 button. The microwave's glass turntable provides even, consistent cooking and is easy to clean. The child control lock shuts down the control panel pads to avoid unintended use of the microwave oven. This microwave comes with a 1-year parts and labor warranty and a 5-year compressor part warranty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I have a small all white kitchen and this is perfect. It’s working great. No defects: I’m very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact unit with a big punch.
reviews.reviewText: This little oven is an improvement over previous very similar models. It fits perfectly in a cabinet that came with our house and over the last twenty-two years, we have trusted this brand. Like any appliance, it will wear out and we are now on our third iteration but if this one lasts as long as the previous two, we will buy another in 2031.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great value for such a modest price!
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased this same little microwave four times over the years (this is the second one from Amazon) and it is PERFECT for us as a retired couple who do not need to prepare huge meals. The oven has a lower wattage (700), so I have memorized how to adjust for all cooking times, and appreciate the great ease of operating this attractive and tidy little unit! I have two suggestions to offer for those who may purchase this Magic Chef model: after reading the several negative reviews on Amazon reporting power problems with this oven, I researched general microwave safety issues online - and ANY microwaves could present electrical malfunctions. (With the four Magic Chefs I have owned, I've never experienced any problems whatsoever of that nature.) One article I read recommended that it is a very good idea to disconnect your microwave from power while it is not needed - which I do now regularly. My other suggestion is that the white enamel paint on this microwave is prone to rusting if left wet after use. Now, after every time in which humidity has formed inside my oven from the cooking process, I wipe down the interior with a paper towel to keep the rust at bay. These two steps to preserve my oven are not difficult. I definitely recommend this Magic Chef unit, and would not trade it for any other model!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooks great and is so easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: I have used this model microwave from Magic Chef since 2018 when I bought a hew house and the microwave was left, intentionally in the pantry. 5 years later, I moved again. We bought the exact same model for our new house and it’s fantastic. All controls are easy to use. It cooks so well and never burns. Only 900 watts, but it really gets the job done. Compact enough for the counter but powerful enough for any job. I won’t use any other microwave at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Little Microwave
reviews.reviewText: Read the reviews on Amazon before making a decision. So many were more expensive and had negative reviews. Reviews are right about this little counter size microwave. Works great, good looking and costs much less. Definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t buy - Lasted only 22 months
reviews.reviewText: The first time I purchased this microwave it lasted over 12 years of daily use so I thought I’d buy the same model again. Big mistake. I could tell from the underside and back that the interior components had changed in an apparent redesign of the original model.The quality has dropped substantially over the years to the point that it’s not worth purchasing. After six months the paint on the inside started to peel off revealing bare metal. Then after 22 months it suddenly stopped working. That’s an 84% shorter life span. It looks like the original long lasting model but don’t be fooled. This is not a good product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Meets our needs
reviews.reviewText: Good power, easy to clean. Size was perfect for our space
